name: eddb.io - Elite Dangerous Darker Orange Edition
description: Playing Elite:Dangerous in the middle of the night is nice, because it's a dark and spacey game... but then when you alt-tab out to your favorite Trade & Commodity Tool (eddb.io), it's an awful white-and-blue website that kills your orange-and-black-adjusted vision. I decided to fix this problem. This userstyle works for both eddb.io & ross.eddb.io.
additional_info: RELEASE NOTES: * 1.0.4 (Trade Route Update) - 2015/12/14 - At a fellow Commander's request, I have updated the Trade Route's CSS so it isn't green/white anymore. If anyone has issues with my update, feel free to contact me. * 1.0.3 (Initial Release) - 2015/04/25 - I heavily modified the userstyle, style 109646 (last modified: 2015/02/03) by user 169121, to make eddb.io look considerably more like the Elite:Dangerous game interface. I also added a background image (Hubble Starfield) and changed the default font to Google Font's Roboto (this is commented out, you must manually uncomment this to use this). Initial warning: I built and customized this entirely with Chrome with ZERO testing in Firefox. I'll test with Firefox sometime else, so be forewarned: YMMV. CONTACT: If for some reason you feel I absolutely need to fix something or add something, you can shoot me an email with your request. Get my email address by solving this Google reCAPTCHA.

discussions.name: Add this (as a new section) to make it complete dark without bright backgrounds
